text: ya qawm lakum alsultan alyawm zahirin fi 'ard "msr " ealaa reytkm min bani 'iisrayiyl wghyrhm, fman yadfae eanaa eadhab allah 'iin hll bna? qal fireawn liqawmih mjybana: ma arykm- 'ayuha alnas- min alraay walnsyht 'iilaa ma 'araa linafsi walakum slahana wswabana, wama 'adeukum 'iilaa 'iilaa tariq alhaqu walswab
